page.title: 12The Den - Kennoway
page.content: { Kennoway Den}runs in a north - south direction on the western edge of the village and through it runs the Kennoway Burn. Recently, through the efforts of Kirkcaldy District Council and the Youth Opportunities Programme, the area has been greatly improved by the provision of a small car park, better bridges over the burn, pathways constructed and at the Den Green a children's paddling pool has been formed. In past years the{Den Green}was used by the village's flourishing{Linen {Industry}as the site for bleaching the raw linen cloth in the sunshine. Now the Green is a favourite picnic spot and the Den is a pleasant place for a quiet walk.
